title: Ranked and Normal draft disabled on OCE?
body:
I recently transferred from the NA servers to OCE, i got up this morning to play some ranked solo q only to find only blind pick was available.
Apparently this is fairly common since a few of my teamamtes in a VS AI match said that the servers were always down early morning which leads me to ask why normal draft is also unavailable. Theres nothing on the server status page (http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce) about any of this so im asking is this normal? Is there a reason for it? What time does ranked or normal draft come back online exactly?

replies.body: Wait what? Ranked is always available, unless it's down for server maintenance.
